item.title: About
item.description: Flarus provides technical support, localization and distribution of Flarum for Russian-speaking users.

item.title: Resources
item.description: GitHub / Flarum Built with Flarum GitHub / Package Store Kitsune Solar

item.title: Disclaimer
item.description: Flarus collaborates with Flarum contributors and is not directly related to Flarum Foundation or Flarum project. Flarum logo is owned by Flarum Foundation.
